content.prompt: The cartoon above illustrates which of the following?

choices.label: Late-eighteenth-century calls for abolition of the Atlantic slave trade
Social inequalities under the Old Regime in France
Aristocratic hostility to Peter the Great’s efforts to Westernize Russia
Napoleon’s suppression of the Spanish nationalist movement

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
